finetuned_embedding_fallback.notes: Uses fast path fallback, only loads model if needed

anomaly_detection.notes: Efficient numpy operations, <1ms per query when trained

evidence_chain_building.notes: Lightweight dict operations and string formatting

prompt_injection_attacks.protection_mechanism: Safety checks unchanged - Phase 3.5 features are advisory-only

context_poisoning.protection_mechanism: Confidence scoring and citation requirements still enforced

citation_evasion.protection_mechanism: Phase 3.5 adds evidence chain, doesn't remove citation checks

confidence_manipulation.protection_mechanism: Anomaly detection flags suspicious patterns, baseline checks unchanged

graceful_degradation.layer_init_fail: ✓ Query proceeds with baseline (no Phase 3.5 features)
graceful_degradation.model_missing: ✓ Falls back to alternative model or baseline
graceful_degradation.detector_unavailable: ✓ Anomaly detection skipped, all other features work
